abstract: In the present paper, we proved the sharp inequality |H3,1(f)|≤1/9\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$|H_{3,1}(f)|\le 1/9$$\end{document} for analytic functions f with an:=f(n)(0)/n!,n∈N,a1:=1,\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$a_n:=f^{(n)}(0)/n!,\ n\in {\mathbb {N}},\ a_1:=1,$$\end{document} such that Rezf′(z)f(z)>12,z∈D:={z∈C:|z|<1},\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$\begin{aligned} {{\mathrm{Re}}}\frac{zf'(z)}{f(z)}> \frac{1}{2},\quad z\in {\mathbb {D}}:=\{z \in {\mathbb {C}} : |z|<1\}, \end{aligned}$$\end{document}where H3,1(f):=a1a2a3a2a3a4a3a4a5\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$\begin{aligned} H_{3,1}(f):= \begin{vmatrix} a_1&\quad a_2&\quad a_3 \\ a_2&\quad a_3&\quad a_4 \\ a_3&\quad a_4&\quad a_5 \end{vmatrix} \end{aligned}$$\end{document}is the third Hankel determinant.
